net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Class JavaxJson

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.JavaxJson

  • public final class JavaxJson
extends Object
    Simple DSL for constructing javax.json objects for ProgressCheckFactory configs using only three-letter identifiers.

    Recommend using import static net.adamcin.oakpal.core.JavaxJson.*;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JavaxJson.Arr
      Constructs an array by iterating over a list of JavaxJson.Value instances.
      static interface  JavaxJson.ArrayConvertible
      Custom pojo types which should be usable within this DSL should implement this method to provide a JsonArray, which can be wrapped quickly by val(Object).
      static interface  JavaxJson.As<TYPE>
      Defines a get method returns the constructed type parameter.
      static interface  JavaxJson.Cursor
      Type which allows a different fluent style for building keys, i.e.
      static interface  JavaxJson.HasValue
      Defines a method toValue which coalesces the underlying value to prevent over-wrapping by the val(Object) method.
      static class  JavaxJson.Key
      Iterative key-value pair type for building JavaxJson.Obj instances.
      static class  JavaxJson.KeyCursor
      Cursor type originating from a call to key(String), and which therefore returns a lone JavaxJson.Key for JavaxJson.KeyCursor.val(Object).
      static class  JavaxJson.Obj
      Constructs an object by iterating over a list of JavaxJson.Key instances.
      static class  JavaxJson.ObjCursor
      Cursor type originating from a call to JavaxJson.Key.key(String) or JavaxJson.Obj.key(String), and which therefore returns a new JavaxJson.Obj with the newly-finished key appended internally.
      static interface  JavaxJson.ObjectConvertible
      Custom pojo types which should be usable within this DSL should implement this method to provide a JsonObject, which can be wrapped quickly by val(Object).
      static class  JavaxJson.Value
      Discrete value wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static javax.json.JsonValue wrap(Object object)
        Ensures that a Java typed object is wrapped with the appropriate JsonValue type. Performs the reverse of unwrap(JsonValue).
        Parameters:
        object - the Java type to wrap
        Returns:
        a JsonValue-wrapped object

      • unwrap

        public static Object unwrap(javax.json.JsonValue jsonValue)
        This method performs the reverse of wrap(Object). Unwraps a JsonValue to its associated non-Json value. JsonString to String, JsonNumber to Number, JsonValue.NULL to null, JsonValue.TRUE to true, JsonValue.FALSE to false, JsonArray to List<Object>, JsonObject to Map<String, Object>.
        Parameters:
        jsonValue - the wrapped JsonValue
        Returns:
        the associated Java value

      • unwrapObject

        public static Map<String,Object> unwrapObject(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
        Supports unwrap(JsonValue) for typed unwrapping of JsonObject to Map<String, Object>.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the json object to unwrap
        Returns:
        the equivalent map

      • unwrapArray

        public static List<Object> unwrapArray(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray)
        Supports unwrap(JsonValue) for typed unwrapping of JsonArray to List<Object>.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the json array to unwrap
        Returns:
        the equivalent list

      • val

        public static JavaxJson.Value val(Object value)
        Ensures that an object reference is wrapped appropriately for use in the DSL.
        Parameters:
        value - null, an instance of JavaxJson.HasValue, or some type supported by wrap(Object).
        Returns:
        a DSL-wrapped value

        Create an object with the provided key-value pairs.

        Returns:

        public static JavaxJson.Obj obj(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a new obj

      • key

        public static JavaxJson.Key key(String key,
                                Object value)
        Creates a key-value pair for use with obj(Key...). See also JavaxJson.Obj.key(String, Object).
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Returns:
        a key-value pair.

      • key

        public static JavaxJson.KeyCursor key(String key)
        Begin a key-value pair without providing a value argument. val(Object) must be called to provide a value for the key-value pair before more keys are appended.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        a cursor waiting for a value

      • arr

        public static JavaxJson.Arr arr(Object... values)
        Creates an array with the provided values.
        Parameters:
        values - the value elements of the array
        Returns:
        a new array

                                                        String key)
        Retrieve a value as an object if the specified key is present, or empty() if not.
        Parameters:
        json - the object to retrieve an object value from
        key - the array's key
        Returns:
        an optional array

      • objectOrEmpty

        public static javax.json.JsonObject objectOrEmpty(javax.json.JsonObject json,
                                                  String key)
        Retrieve a value as an object, or return the empty object if key is not present or if the value is the wrong type.
        Parameters:
        json - the object to retrieve an object value from
        key - the key to retrieve
        Returns:
        a JsonObject, always

        public static List<String> mapArrayOfStrings(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray)
        Filters and maps the provided JsonArray into a List<String>.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the array of strings
        Returns:
        a list of strings

      • mapArrayOfStrings

        public static <R> List<R> mapArrayOfStrings(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray,
                                            Function<String,R> mapFunction)
        Filters and maps the provided JsonArray into a List<String>, then applies the provided mapFunction to each result to return a typed list.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the mapFunction result type
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the input array
        mapFunction - the function mapping String to R
        Returns:
        a list of the same type as the mapFunction result type

      • mapArrayOfStrings

        public static <R> List<R> mapArrayOfStrings(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray,
                                            Function<String,R> mapFunction,
                                            boolean discardNulls)
        Filters and maps the provided JsonArray into a List<String>, then applies the provided mapFunction to each result to return a typed list.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the mapFunction result type
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the input array
        mapFunction - the function mapping String to R
        discardNulls - true to filter out null results returned by the mapFunction (default false).
        Returns:
        a list of the same type as the mapFunction result type

        Type Parameters:
        R - the mapFunction result type
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the input array
        mapFunction - the function mapping JsonObject to R
        Returns:
        a list of the same type as the mapFunction result type

                                            boolean discardNulls)

        Type Parameters:
        R - the mapFunction result type
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the input array
        mapFunction - the function mapping JsonObject to R
        discardNulls - true to filter out null results returned by the mapFunction (default false).
        Returns:
        a list of the same type as the mapFunction result type

      • parseFromArray

        public static <R> List<R> parseFromArray(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray,
                                         Util.TryFunction<String,R> parser,
                                         BiConsumer<String,Exception> errorConsumer)
        Parse string elements of an array into arbitrary objects, (like URLs).
        Type Parameters:
        R - the mapFunction result type
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the array of strings
        parser - the parser function
        errorConsumer - an optional error handler
        Returns:
        a list of parser results
        See Also:
        Util.composeTry(Function, Supplier, Util.TryFunction, BiConsumer)

      • hasNonNull

        public static boolean hasNonNull(javax.json.JsonObject json,
                                 String key)
        Convenience method to check to avoid type errors when getting a typed value backed by a JsonValue.NULL.
        Parameters:
        json - the json object to check a key on.
        key - the key to check for presence and non-nullness.
        Returns:
        true if key is present and mapped to non-null value.
